channel.title: Project proxy unlimited
channel.description: Ok, as you know, proxies may seem hard to make? not really, its pretty easy. I will construct one, i just need to do the coding, i will update later in the week, it will be simple (like <frame src = " $text"> get["proxy.php"]; though ^ that code wont work since you still need the display, though i will be look at tutorials to help using the $GET_[""] function and much more, and opionons?

item.title: Project proxy unlimited
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

lol that isnt how a proxy works… a proxy server actually gathers the contents of the web page your visiting, then saves it inside a cgi-bin… if you want a proxy on your site heres a good one…

http://captainkoala.com/

Read full topic
